_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three people found in the world [an3: A person you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend
A person you should associate with, accompany, and attend
A person you should associate with, accompany, and attend with honor and respect
Characteristics of the person you should: Someone who is inferior in terms of ethics
Someone who is inferior in terms of immersion
Someone who is inferior in terms of wisdom
Someone who is similar in terms of ethics
Someone who is similar in terms of immersion
Someone who is similar in terms of wisdom
Someone who is superior in terms of ethics
Someone who is superior in terms of immersion
Someone who is superior in terms of wisdom
